name: The More The Merrier!
description:
The More The Merrier!

You're throwing a massive party divided in three rooms.

As host, you need to move guests from room to room to maximise their happiness.

There's three types of guests:

  1. Circles like being surrounded by other Circles..
  2. Triangles dislike being around other Triangles.
  3. Squares want to massively outnumber Triangles.

Use your mouse to drag-n-drop people from one room to another.

Enjoy! :D
